LanguageData.Miho_Child_FoxTwo.title: ordinary fox
LanguageData.Miho_Child_FoxTwo.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was just a normal fox in the city of Miho. {PAWN_pronoun} attended a mediocre school and acquired mediocre knowledge.
LanguageData.Miho_Child_RuralTwo.title: country fox
LanguageData.Miho_Child_RuralTwo.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a fox living happy days in the countryside. {PAWN_pronoun} took care of animals, grew plants, walked in the forest and had happy days.
LanguageData.Miho_Child_HuntFoxTwo.title: hunting fox
LanguageData.Miho_Child_HuntFoxTwo.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was an amazing hunter. No one knows what is so amazing about {PAWN_objective}.
LanguageData.Miho_Child_OrphanTwo.title: abandoned fox
LanguageData.Miho_Child_OrphanTwo.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] has been abandoned by {PAWN_possessive} parents or lost them. Even though {PAWN_pronoun} went through a lot of hardships {PAWN_pronoun} is still alive and well.
LanguageData.Miho_Child_GiftedTwo.title: genius
LanguageData.Miho_Child_GiftedTwo.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a fox with high intellectual abilities. {PAWN_pronoun} often looked for adult company because {PAWN_pronoun} couldn't properly talk to her friends.
LanguageData.Miho_Child_DesertTwo.title: desert fox
LanguageData.Miho_Child_DesertTwo.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was literally a desert fox. {PAWN_pronoun} can tolerate heat very well.
LanguageData.Miho_Child_BraveTwo.title: brave fox
LanguageData.Miho_Child_BraveTwo.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a brave fox. {PAWN_pronoun} was so brave that {PAWN_pronoun} had no friends.
